results.name: Permutation of natural numbers induced by the Catalan bijection gma086428 acting on symbolless S-expressions encoded by A014486/A063171.
comment: This Catalan bijection rotates by "half step" the interpretations (pp)-(rr) of Stanley, using the "descending slope" mapping illustrated in A086431.
link: A. Karttunen, Gatomorphisms (With the complete Scheme source)
Index entries for signature-permutations induced by Catalan automorphisms
xref: Number of cycles: A002995. Number of fixed points: A019590. Max. cycle size: A057543. (In range [A014137(n-1)..A014138(n-1)] of this permutation, possibly shifted one term left or right).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 23 2003
